Description: AT101: Example 1
INPUT
{
  message: {
  battery: 100,
  geofence_status: 'unset',
  latitude: 24.62495,
  longitude: 118.030576,
  motion_status: 'moving',
  position: 'normal',
  temperature: 28.3
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 },
  temperature: { unitId: 'Cel', record: 28.3 },
  location: { unitId: 'GPS', record: [118.030576,24.62495] }
}

---------------------------------

Description: AT101: Example 2
INPUT
{
  message: {
  battery: 100,
  motion_status: 'moving',
  position: 'tilt',
  temperature: 28.3,
  wifi: [
    {
      group: 8,
      mac: '1c:c3:16:22:2d:f9',
      rssi: -61
    },
    {
      group: 8,
      mac: '24:e1:24:f6:a6:67',
      rssi: -74
    },
    {
      group: 8,
      mac: '24:e1:24:f5:4d:e3',
      rssi: -68
    },
    {
      group: 8,
      mac: '24:e1:24:f5:79:71',
      rssi: -78
    },
    {
      group: 8,
      mac: '24:e1:24:f3:19:a8',
      rssi: -56
    }
  ]
}
}

OUTPUT
{
  batteryLevel: { unitId: '%', record: 100 },
  temperature: { unitId: 'Cel', record: 28.3 },
  'rssi:0': { unitId: 'dBm', record: -61 },
  'mac:0': { unitId: 'IEEE-802', record: "1c:c3:16:22:2d:f9", nature: 'WIFI' },
  'rssi:1': { unitId: 'dBm', record: -74 },
  'mac:1': { unitId: 'IEEE-802', record: "24:e1:24:f6:a6:67", nature: 'WIFI' },
  'rssi:2': { unitId: 'dBm', record: -68 },
  'mac:2': { unitId: 'IEEE-802', record: "24:e1:24:f5:4d:e3", nature: 'WIFI' },
  'rssi:3': { unitId: 'dBm', record: -78 },
  'mac:3': { unitId: 'IEEE-802', record: "24:e1:24:f5:79:71", nature: 'WIFI' },
  'rssi:4': { unitId: 'dBm', record: -56 },
  'mac:4': { unitId: 'IEEE-802', record: "24:e1:24:f3:19:a8", nature: 'WIFI' }
}
